description: Brew Interactive's managing director says going fully remote should be a collective decision made with staff. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Future of work: Remote work attracts top talent but consider the challenges too, says marketing boss
title_page: Future of work: Remote work attracts top talent but consider the challenges too, says marketing boss | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Digital marketing agency Brew Interactive gave up its office in a Joo Chiat shophouse to go fully remote in 2020.
“We realised not many people were using the office space. It was a collective decision,” says Mr Marcus Ho, 35, its managing director.
